products.title: iPhone 12
products.description: The iPhone 12 features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, a Ceramic Shield design with four times better drop performance, and the A14 Bionic chip, the fastest in a smartphone.

products.title: MacBook Air
products.description: The MacBook Air is more powerful than ever with Apple's M1 chip. With up to 18 hours of battery life, it's the perfect laptop for work and play.

products.title: iPad Pro
products.description: The iPad Pro features a 12.9-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, Apple's M1 chip, and a TrueDepth camera with Face ID. It's the most advanced iPad to date.

products.title: Apple Watch Series 7
products.description: The Apple Watch Series 7 has a larger and more durable display, a redesigned design, and new features to keep you connected and healthy.

products.title: AirPods Pro
products.description: AirPods Pro feature active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and a custom fit for an immersive sound experience.

products.title: HomePod mini
products.description: The HomePod mini is a smart speaker that offers incredible sound and the power of Siri to control your smart home.

products.title: MacBook Pro
products.description: The MacBook Pro is more powerful than ever with Apple's M1 chip. With up to 20 hours of battery life, it's the perfect laptop for work and play.

products.title: iMac
products.description: The iMac features a 27-inch Retina 5K display, Apple's M1 chip, and a sleek and slim design. It's the perfect desktop computer for work and play.

products.title: Apple TV 4K
products.description: The Apple TV 4K lets you watch movies and shows in amazing 4K HDR quality. Streams live sports and news. And has great content from apps like Netflix, Hulu, and ESPN.

products.title: AirTag
products.description: AirTag is a super-easy way to keep track of your stuff. Attach one to your keys, slip another in your backpack. And just like that, theyâ€™re on your radar in the Find My app.

products.title: Samsung Galaxy S21
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy S21 features a 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display, a powerful Exynos 2100 processor, and a triple camera setup with 64MP main sensor.

products.title: Google Pixel 5
products.description: The Google Pixel 5 features a 6-inch OLED display, a powerful Snapdragon 765G processor, and a dual camera setup with a 12.2MP main sensor.

products.title: Dell XPS 13
products.description: The Dell XPS 13 features a 13.3-inch InfinityEdge display, a powerful Intel Core i7 processor, and a sleek and slim design. It's the perfect laptop for work and play.

products.title: Bose QuietComfort Earbuds
products.description: The Bose QuietComfort Earbuds feature active noise cancellation, transparency mode, and a custom fit for an immersive sound experience.

products.title: Sony WH-1000XM4
products.description: The Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones feature industry-leading noise cancellation, exceptional sound quality, and a comfortable fit for all-day wear.
